price: Who fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear[4].
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
footnotes: [4] The people of Quraysh were blessed with provision and security probably because of the prayer of Abraham. See 14:35-37

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
